title: HOUR 1 - Game 3, Curry, PGA
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Game 3, Curry, PGA
description:
Thoughts on game 3 of the NBA Finals

Steph Curry really could use Kevin Durant right now

PGA Tour suspends all players taking part in first LIV Golf tournament


Guest: J. A. Adande
